column4: ok guys tell me which Torrent client is best other than Azureus.. Actually Azureus is not working on my platform.. some kinda problem with Java
to use azureus on ubuntu you need to use sun's java and download azureus from azureus.sf.net
void^ i have sun java installed
and you need to use azureus from azureus.sf.net, not the ubuntu packaged version.
